additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Purified Water, Glycerin, Sorbitol, Poloxamer 338, PEG-60, Hydrogentate Castor Oil, Sodium Benzoate, Flavour, Cetylpyridinium Chloride, Methyl Paraben, Sodium Fluoride, Sodium Saccahrin, Disodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate, Cl 42090

additionalProperty.name: Contains
additionalProperty.value: Contains 3% w/w Potassium Nitrate and 0.048% w/w Sodium Fluoride (217ppm fluoride).

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Adults and children, 12 years of age and over. Always follow the label. Keep out of reach of children. Do not drink from the bottle. Not for use by children under 12 years of age unless on the advice of a dental professional or doctor. Keep out of reach of children.
